plot outline: Yugam is a 2012 Indian Tamil film, directed by Sri Pavanshekhar and produced by G. Ravikumar and P. Poongodi. The film stars Rahul Madhav, Deepti, Super Good Lakshman, Ravi Mariya and Paandu in lead roles. The film had musical score by Ponraj. Watch the full movie, Yugam online, only on Eros Now.
